# domain

**Instance Property**

The error domain that should be used to interpret the error. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFStreamErrorDomain] for possible values.

## Declaration

```swift
var domain: CFIndex
```
title: domain
